config = [24, 500, 100, 100]
# grid search
scores = repeat_evaluate(data, config, n_test)
# summarize scores
summarize_scores(' mlp' , scores)
Listing 14.24: Example of an MLP model for forecasting monthly car sales.
Running the example prints the RMSE for each of the 30 repeated evaluations of the model.
At the end of the run, the average and standard deviation RMSE are reported of about 1,526
sales. We can see that, on average, the chosen conÔ¨Åguration has better performance than both
